content:
Who am I?

That is a question I have been asking myself for a long time. I am a student, a programmer, a writer, a thinker, a dreamer, a believer, a lover, a hater, a friend, a foe, a human, a soul, a being, a nothing, a everything. I am a person, and I am not. I am a mystery, and I am not. I am a paradox, and I am not. I am a contradiction, and I am not. I am a question, and I am not. I am an answer, and I am not. I am a truth, and I am not. I am a lie, and I am not. I am a story, and I am not. I am a myth, and I am not. I am a legend, and I am not. I am a god, and I am not. I am a devil, and I am not. I am a hero, and I am not. I am a villain, and I am not. I am a saint, and I am not. I am a sinner, and I am not. I am a warrior, and I am not. I am a coward, and I am not. I am a king, and I am not. I am a slave, and I am not. I am a master, and I am not. I am a servant, and I am not. I am a leader, and I am not. I am a follower, and I am not. I am a teacher, and I am not. I am a student, and I am not. I am a creator, and I am not. I am a destroyer, and I am not. I am a lover, and I am not. I am a hater, and I am not. I am a dreamer, and I am not. I am a realist, and I am not. I am a believer, and I am not. I am a skeptic, and I am not. I am a friend, and I am not. I am a foe, and I am not. I am a human, and I am not. I am a soul, and I am not. I am a being, and I am not. I am a nothing, and I am not. I am a everything, and I am not. I am a person, and I am not. I am a mystery, and I am not. I am a paradox, and I am not. I am a contradiction, and I am not. I am a question, and I am not. I am an answer, and I am not. I am a truth, and I am not. I am a lie, and I am not. I am a story, and I am not. I am a myth, and I am not. I am a legend, and I am not. I am a god, and I am not. I am a devil, and I am not. I am a hero, and I am not. I am a villain, and I am not. I am a saint, and I am not. I am a sinner, and I am not. I am a warrior, and I am not. I am a coward, and I am not. I am a king, and I am not. I am a slave, and I am not. I am a master, and I am not. I am a servant, and I am not. I am a leader, and I am not. I am a follower, and I am not. I am a teacher, and I am not. I am a student, and I am not. I am a creator, and I am not. I am a destroyer, and I am not. I am a lover, and I am not. I am a hater, and I am not. I am a dreamer, and I am not. I am a realist, and I am not. I am a believer, and I am not. I am a skeptic, and I am not. I am a friend, and I am not. I am a foe, and I am not. I am a human, and I am not. I am a soul, and I am not. I am a being, and I am not. I am a nothing, and I am not. I am a everything, and I am not. I am a person, and I am not. I am a mystery, and I am not. I am a paradox, and I am not. I am a contradiction, and I am not. I am a question, and I am not. I am an answer, and I am not. I am a truth, and I am not. I am a lie, and I am not. I am a story, and I am not. I am a myth, and I am not. I am a legend, and I am not. I am a god, and I am not. I am a devil, and I am not.

I am me, and I am not.

What do I do?

I do many things. I study, I work, I play, I rest, I think, I write, I read, I watch, I listen, I speak, I listen, I learn, I teach, I create, I destroy, I love, I hate, I dream, I wake, I believe, I doubt, I hope, I fear, I laugh, I cry, I smile, I frown, I live, I die. I do many things, and I do not.

Why do I do it?

I do it because I can. I do it because I must. I do it because I want. I do it because I need. I do it because I love. I do it because I hate. I do it because I believe. I do it because I doubt. I do it because I hope. I do it because I fear. I do it because I laugh. I do it because I cry. I do it because I smile. I do it because I frown. I do it because I live. I do it because I die. I do it because I can, and I do not.

How do I do it?

I do it with my mind, my body, my heart, my soul, my being, my nothing, my everything. I do it with my hands, my feet, my eyes, my ears, my mouth, my nose, my skin, my bones, my blood, my breath. I do it with my thoughts, my words, my actions, my dreams, my hopes, my fears, my love, my hate, my joy, my sorrow, my pain, my pleasure. I do it with my past, my present, my future. I do it with my memories, my dreams, my desires, my fears, my doubts, my beliefs, my questions, my answers, my truths, my lies, my stories, my myths, my legends, my gods, my devils, my heroes, my villains, my saints, my sinners, my warriors, my cowards, my kings, my slaves, my masters, my servants, my leaders, my followers, my teachers, my students, my creators, my destroyers, my lovers, my haters, my dreamers, my realists, my believers, my skeptics, my friends, my foes, my humans, my souls, my beings, my nothings, my everythings. I do it with my mind, and I do not.

Where do I do it?

I do it here, there, everywhere. I do it in my room, my house, my street, my city, my country, my world, my universe. I do it in my mind, my body, my heart, my soul, my being, my nothing, my everything. I do it in my thoughts, my words, my actions, my dreams, my hopes, my fears, my love, my hate, my joy, my sorrow, my pain, my pleasure. I do it in my past, my present, my future. I do it in my memories, my dreams, my desires, my fears, my doubts, my beliefs, my questions, my answers, my truths, my lies, my stories, my myths, my legends, my gods, my devils, my heroes, my villains, my saints, my sinners, my warriors, my cowards, my kings, my slaves, my masters, my servants, my leaders, my followers, my teachers, my students, my creators, my destroyers, my lovers, my haters, my dreamers, my realists, my believers, my skeptics, my friends, my foes, my humans, my souls, my beings, my nothings, my everythings. I do it here, there, everywhere, and I do not.

When do I do it?

I do it now, then, always. I do it in the morning, the afternoon, the evening, the night. I do it in the spring, the summer, the autumn, the winter. I do it in the past, the present, the future. I do it in the memories, the dreams, the desires, the fears, the doubts, the beliefs, the questions, the answers, the truths, the lies, the stories, the myths, the legends, the gods, the devils, the heroes, the villains, the saints, the sinners, the warriors, the cowards, the kings, the slaves, the masters, the servants, the leaders, the followers, the teachers, the students, the creators, the destroyers, the lovers, the haters, the dreamers, the realists, the believers, the skeptics, the friends, the foes, the humans, the souls, the beings, the nothings, the everythings. I do it now, then, always, and I do not.

Why am I doing this?

Haaaaaâ€¦ I am tired of writing this. I am going to stop now. I hope you enjoyed reading it. If you did, please let me know. If you did not, please let me know. If you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or feedback, please let me know. I would love to hear from you. Thank you for your time and attention. Have a great day! Goodbye!
